CustomField.description:
The field on a product-Edition level to influence the billing schedules on the order product.
"Pay in Full”: then it’s one billing transaction with 100 % irrespective of payment schedule on Event edition/quote/oppty and with the "Billing Target date" = today ().
"Pay as per Invoice Plan”: this is just paying as per event cut-off dates (overridden dates during oppty /quote)
"Pay in Full as per the first invoice schedule": then it’s one billing transaction with 100 % with the "Billing Target date" of First Schedule cut-off date - number of days that customer has to pay (Net30).
"Pay in Full as per the second invoice schedule”, then it’s one billing transaction with 100 % with the "Billing Target date" of second Schedule cut-off date - number of days that customer has to pay (Net30)
CustomField.label: Product Invoice property
